ooC: Doh... I lost my post three times while trying to type this... 
=\

-- Megatron >> Hydras --

The left head of the large hydra-like beast mode moves downward 
slightly, as if noding in agreement to something. Inside it's mind, 
Megatron spoke to Galvatron.

<Galvatron... although I know not how this happened, we shall indeed 
join forces and crush all who oppose us...> Megatron's mind speech 
pauses for a second, <This new bot should have a name... Hydras 
sounds fitting does it not?>

ooC: Message me when you next come online on AIM ok aerosmith?


--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  The new dark bot dropped to the ground with a bang. A crater 
around his feet 
> forming. Sending a small shockwave. Shaking he stands up in beast 
mode. 
> Galvatrons thoughts were concentrated on the right one. He looked 
around. He 
> felt his and Megatron as one. He sent a telepathic voice to 
Megatron. "We are 
> one, no more hatred or sorrow is in my spark...our spark for you 
anymore. 
> Shall we join as one and win the Beast Wars?"
